data.system_settings: Fedora 28 x86_64 kernel 4.18.9-200 with KDE desktop environment
data.actual_result: Gets deselected without a way to select it with keyboard or switching channels
data.short_description: Hitting enter in empty text box deselects it, disallowing any other key from reselecting the text box unless switching channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Select Text Box - Hit enter in the text box, or double enter if sending message
